title: Looking for diamond adc duo :D
body:
Hi I’m a diamond 4 sup main. I would like to find a twitch player to duo with as I really like to play lulu and don’t have many friends who are good at this champion :D

Also, I’m practising Rakan on my smurf Gold account. If ur good at Xayah, we can be a good match !
However, if you don't play the above champs and are still keen for duo, you're welcome as well :D

Additionally, I'm also happy to join any teams (preferably girls) if I'm the suitable candidate. 

Feel free to add me : TheEnchantedRose

replies.body: Added you on League. I'm keen to duo.
